Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 99-276.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 595.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to release restrictions on certain property located in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 99-276) Provides that the United States releases restrictions on specified lands in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to release restrictions on certain property located in Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana, and for other purposes.
